description.en: Master the art of prompt structure — the hidden force that separates amateurs from engineers.
description.cs: Ovládněte umění struktury promptů — skrytou sílu, která odděluje amatéry od inženýrů.

learning_outcomes: Understand why prompt structure matters more than word choice
Design prompts using the four-layer architecture
Write effective system prompts as AI operating systems
Use structural patterns: XML tags, delimiters, markdown
Apply basic defenses against prompt injection
